title: Translation Service Available, Dog Park, Stainless Steel Appliances
posting_body: Located in the Twin Creeks neighborhood of Everett, Washington, Tessera Apartments is less than 10 minutes from Boeing and the Everett Naval Station.
With downtown Everett located just 6 miles north and with easy access to I-5, no matter where your traveling, it will be a breeze.
If shopping is what your looking for, the Everett mall is just a short drive down the road where you can find a variety of shops, restaurants, and entertainment options.
At the community, residents enjoy surfing the web using the free wifi in the business center, or getting their workout on in our state-of-the-art fitness center.
With all these conveniences it’s easy to see Tessera is right where you want to be!
Free WiFi located in Business Center
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.
Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.
Please contact us today for the most up to date information!
Carports are available for additional cost.
